MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the PA1 postcode area of Paisley. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 7pm due to an underground cable fault caused by a third party on Causeyside Street and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11pm. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was recorded at 6:03 PM on Thursday, 21 January 2021.
